SEARCH
Package utils

Class Navigation

java.lang.Object
utils.Navigation
public class Navigation extends Object
The Navigation class handles the player's location throughout the game map in a 5x5 grid system. Each tile corresponds to a location with a name, description, and other data such as if the player has already searched the location, if the location has a combat encounter, and if the location has a items.

  • Method Details

    • navigate

      public static void navigate(Player player)
      Handles player navigation by taking input directions and updating the player's location on a 5x5 grid map. Prints the map, current location, and movement options to the console. Triggers combat if the new location has a combat encounter.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is navigating

    • map

      public static void map()
      Prints the 5x5 grid map to the console showing the player's current position, nearby locations on the map.

    • viewCombinedMap

      public static void viewCombinedMap()
      Displays the map of the player's location and the map required for the objective of the game.

    • viewMissionMap

      public static void viewMissionMap()
      Displays the map required for the objective of the game.

    • getRestedLocations

      public static boolean getRestedLocations()
      Checks if the player is able to rest at the location.
      Returns:
      True if the player is able to rest at the location, otherwise false

    • getLocationSearchIndex

      public static int getLocationSearchIndex()
      Checks if the player has searched the location.
      Returns:
      The index of the location search

    • getPossibleEncounters

      public static int getPossibleEncounters()
      Checks the possible encounters the player can have at the location.
      Returns:
      The number of possible encounters

    • updateLocationSearchIndex

      public static void updateLocationSearchIndex(int setIndex)
      Updates the search index to indicate that it has already been searched.
      Parameters:
